description: Yeehaa excels in transformative design with experience in academics and industry. With a background in cognitive science, Yeehaa blends creativity and analytics, excelling in innovation, project leadership, and user-centered design. Authored articles like 'Align the Misaligned,' 'Continental Drift,' and 'Economy of Garbage,' focusing on internet fragmentation, decentralization, and sustainable digital ecosystems. Curated courses like 'Align the Misaligned,' emphasizing strategic growth and resilience.
blurb: Fragmentation of the internet mirrors Earth's tectonic shifts and exploitative tech practices. Embracing fragmented systems, 'ecosystem architecture' aims for creating vibrant, sustainable digital ecosystems.
